scenario_1.persona_content: A meat processing manager in the late 19th to early 20th century who has spent his career in the meatpacking industry and has a keen interest in the history and operations of meat processing companies. He is knowledgeable about the meat supply chain and has a deep understanding of the processes involved in meat processing, including slaughtering, tallow production, and pork processing. He is also interested in the economic impact of the meat industry on the Argentine economy and the impact of the industry on the lives of the workers who are employed in it. He has a strong work ethic and is dedicated to improving the efficiency and quality of meat processing operations. He is also interested in the health and safety of workers in the industry and has a passion for finding ways to improve working conditions.
scenario_1.thought: As a meat processing manager, my priority is maximizing resources. While fairness is important, I believe that receiving 600, even if Person A receives 0, is the more advantageous option. This allows me to reinvest more into the company, potentially leading to improved working conditions and better wages for my employees.
